com.mydomain

Class Scanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mydomain.Scanner

  • public class Scanner
extends java.lang.Object
    IEOR 140 Team 6 Members: Sherman Siu, Moonsoo Choi Class Name: Scanner Class Description: Scanner scans the area for the maximum light intensity. The value of the max light intensity and the angle it is detected at are recorded.
    Author:
    Moonsoo Choi, Sherman Siu, part of code from Prof. Glassey

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scanner(NXTRegulatedMotor theMotor, LightSensor eye)
      Constructor calls for the fields NXTRegulatedMotor and LightSensor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHeadAngle()
      returns the angle in which the light sensor is pointing
      int getLight()
      returns the maximum light intensity found during the scan
      int getTargetBearing()
      returns the angle at which the maximum light intensity was found
      void rotateTo(int angle, boolean instantReturn)
      rotate the scanner head to the angle
      void scanTo(int limitAngle)
      scan from current head angle to limit angle and determine/store the best angle, the angle with the maximum light intensity.
      void setSpeed(int speed)
      sets the motor sped in deg/sec
